title: ‘Share Your Ears’ Make-A-Wish Disney Fundraiser?
subtitle: From 29 January to 14 March 2016, Disney Parks will donate $5 to Make-A-Wish for every ear photo shared online.
author: Kim LaCapria
vclaim: If you share a photo of yourself wearing Mickey Mouse ears, Disney Parks will donate $5 to the Make-A-Wish foundation.
